rmi.tree

Interface RMITreeNode

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RMITreeNodeImpl

    public interface RMITreeNode
extends java.rmi.Remote
    An interface of a remotable object which is able to receive data from its father(s) and send it to its child(ren).
    Author:
    cachera brabant

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addChild(RMITreeNode child) 
      void clearChildren()
      Remove every child of the RMITreeNode so it becomes a leaf.

      java.util.List<RMITreeNode> getChildren() 
      RMITreeNode getFather() 
      java.lang.String getName() 
      java.lang.String getTrace()
      Return a String containing the trace of the propogation since its beginning.
      java.lang.String propagate(byte[] data)
      Give data as an array of byte to the RMITreeNode in order to propagate to the leaves of the tree.
      void removeChild(int index) 
      void removeChild(RMITreeNode child) 
      java.lang.String sendDataToChildren(byte[] data)
      Send data as an array of byte to every children of the RMITreeNode.
      void setFather(RMITreeNode father)
      Set the father of the RMITreeNodeImpl.

    • Method Detail

      • setFather

        void setFather(RMITreeNode father)
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Set the father of the RMITreeNodeImpl. If it's set to null, the RMITreeNodeImpl becomes a root.
        Parameters:
        father - The father of the RMITreeNodeImpl. If it's null, the RMITreeNodeImpl is a root.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • addChild

        void addChild(RMITreeNode child)
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException

                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • clearChildren

        void clearChildren()
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Remove every child of the RMITreeNode so it becomes a leaf.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getFather

        RMITreeNode getFather()
                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

                                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException

                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getTrace

        java.lang.String getTrace()
                          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Return a String containing the trace of the propogation since its beginning.
        Returns:
        The trace of the propogation.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • propagate

        java.lang.String propagate(byte[] data)
                           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Give data as an array of byte to the RMITreeNode in order to propagate to the leaves of the tree.
        Parameters:
        data - The data to propagate to the leaves of the tree.
        Returns:
        The trace of the entire propagation.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • sendDataToChildren

        java.lang.String sendDataToChildren(byte[] data)
                                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Send data as an array of byte to every children of the RMITreeNode. If the node is a leaf, put the message in the trace.
        Parameters:
        data - An array of byte containing the data to send to the children.
        Returns:
        The trace of the children receiving the data.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
